arts.ttl: Vitor Roque takes shots at Xavi – “At Barcelona I learned a lot about the good things and the bad things”
arts.sum: Real Betis forward Vitor Roque has arrived with plenty of baggage in Seville following a torrid six months at Barcelona, which he is unloading bit by bit. Roque seems to be settling in at the Benito Villamarin though. After receiving no shortage of criticism at Barcelona, Roque appears to be trying to put his stint […] The post Vitor Roque takes shots at Xavi – “At Barcelona I learned a lot about the good things and the bad things” appeared first on Football España.

arts.ttl: Crisis looms for City: three defeats in a row, the shadow of Rodri, Pep's farewell...
arts.sum: Pep Guardiola's side were thrashed in Lisbon by Ruben Amorin's Sporting CP (4-1), which extends a series of defeats (three in a row) that is completed with elimination from the Carabao Cup against Tottenham (2-1) and defeat in the Premier League against Bournemouth (2-1). In the 'Pep era', something like this has not happened since April 2018, and if City were to lose to Brighton next weekend, it would be an unprecedented event: four consecutive defeats for Guardiola in Manchester.

arts.ttl: Preview: Real Betis vs. Celje - prediction, team news, lineups
